metadata.name: Shadows on stone on a sunny day #93
metadata.description: Generative project in P5.js

issuer.name: Shadows on stone on a sunny day

metadata.name: Takashi's Death #369
metadata.description:
Akira by Katsuhiro Otomo.
A global landmark in the shaping of the Cyberpunk genre, and a watershed title for the medium.

I got my hands on the tank≈çbon(s) more than 20 years ago and those pages upon pages at the end of the third one depicting the destruction of Neo-Tokyo stayed with me ever since. Pages of stunning destruction, leaving me in awe.

This is my generative take on the subject. An attempt to evoke the power of that one panel in a cohesive collection.

Everything procedurally generated at runtime.
You can find more info on the composition here : https://ulucode.com/wp/takashis-death/

Export a PNG capture at various resolutions by pressing the number keys 1 to 9 (top row or numpad, and only in live mode, after pressing "open"). Resolutions ranges from 720 to 7680 pixels ( height ). I recommend starting with "4".

More features are available, but a decent GPU is recommended:
- Press "space" to toggle an animation on/off
- Press "u" to Unlock the camera. You can then :
. Mouse left : Rotate
. Mouse middle/wheel : Zoom
. Mouse right : Translate
. "r" : reset camera
. "a" : change antialiasing quality : 3 settings in rotation. Try this if your framerate is too low.

metadata.name: Hypercolor Weavemaker #152
metadata.description:
Multiple weaves formulated by between 5 and 10 uniquely located walkers over 2000 frames.
Satisfying to watch the reveal. 
Rarity includes:
- Background color Black (approx 70%) - White (approx 20%) - Rare Palette Color (approx 70%) 
- One of thirty-one palettes
- Dominant Thrust - Horizontal (40%), Vertical (40%) or rare Equilibirum (20%) 
- Number of Walkers (5 to 10)
- Location of each Walker, defining the output shape

Made by P1xelboy :
@p1x3lboy June 2022

metadata.name: Totalistic Cellular Automata #465
metadata.description:
Totalistic Cellular Automata is a work celebrating my appreciation and love for 1D Cellular Automata. In this piece there are many different rules and rulesets which dictate how the cells will behave. Totalistic cellular automata is a type of cellular automata where the total or average values of cells in a neighborhood are what the rules depend on.

Clicking the image continues or pauses the generation.

There are 4 dimension sizes, 4 possible states, 52 possible rulesets, and 55 colorways. 

This generator was inspired by the works and discoveries of Stephen Wolfram and ‚ÄúRGB Elementary Cellular Automata‚Äù by Ciphrd which will always have a special place in my heart.

JohnWow(2022)

metadata.name: fx_doughs #4606
Reveries Automata #4
metadata.description:
"The lifetime of a being translated into dualistic combinations. Each individual maintains their perspective of things. Each individual has its pillars and its interferences. A life without concerns can be cleaner and quieter, but undeniably a little chaos can add to the beauty of a whole. It's all about it. Order. Chaos. Singularity is precious. Differences are our riches. Royal beings."

"Reveries Automata" is a generative project that combines AI Art with creative coding. This project was made to be minted on Fxhash and it's inspired on my previous collection "Reveries" where I explore the abstract nuances of art using diffusion models.

I wanted to explore this field of image composition inside creative coding. The solution I came up with was to reveal the images using coded masks.
There are 3 main functions for that:

The Pillars - made basically tiling a separate layer proportionally in the canvas with random sizes, position and rotation (just 2 options for this one, 0 or 90 degrees). Then using this layer as a mask to my base image. Tinted in the colors white, black, blue, red, gold or green.

The Splashes -  A function that makes random ellipses around the canvas in a separate layer, attached in the back and front pillar. And, again, using this layer as a mask to my base image. Tinted in the same color the pillar received.

The Interferences - Probably the one that gave me more trouble to adapt. This funcion is a flow field that uses the color and brightness of my base image to draw and color itself. First I plot particles to use as initial position of the flow and make them draw based on the difference in brightness of my base image. The flow is coloured getting the pixel position of that base image. Tinted in the colors white, gold or black.

To support those code functions and to make sure that the outputs will have many variations, I've prompted and composited 40 base images that are used as background, patterns, textures, flow drawing/colouring and frames.

There are concrete textures, painting flow textures and golden foil textures for background and pillars; Rough contrasted painting flows (white and gold) for the interferences; Labyrinth, Rectangular and Copacabana patterns; 6 paper frames variations to finalize the composition.

Press "G" to save currebt .png canvas.

Read more about: https://brunomerli.com/reveries-automata

metadata.name: FXHASH Generative Logo #378
metadata.description:
Unique iteration of the first Generative Token minted on fxhash.

It also servers as the actual logo of the platform. It represents the generative processes driving fxhash tokens. Generative Tokens are fed with a unique hash to produce unique outputs based on the hash ‚Äî they are functions with a hash as single input.

The growth that comes out of the text is driven by a "Dividing-Aggregating Walkers" (DAW) algorithm. The hash drives all the DAW settings, as well as a mutation factor which is responsible for changes in each Walker parameters as they divide.

Some iterations will produce very simple outputs whereas others might be more chaotic.

Piece by @ciphrd for fxhash

metadata.name: Reveries Automata #7
metadata.description:
"The lifetime of a being translated into dualistic combinations. Each individual maintains their perspective of things. Each individual has its pillars and its interferences. A life without concerns can be cleaner and quieter, but undeniably a little chaos can add to the beauty of a whole. It's all about it. Order. Chaos. Singularity is precious. Differences are our riches. Royal beings."

"Reveries Automata" is a generative project that combines AI Art with creative coding. This project was made to be minted on Fxhash and it's inspired on my previous collection "Reveries" where I explore the abstract nuances of art using diffusion models.

I wanted to explore this field of image composition inside creative coding. The solution I came up with was to reveal the images using coded masks.
There are 3 main functions for that:

The Pillars - made basically tiling a separate layer proportionally in the canvas with random sizes, position and rotation (just 2 options for this one, 0 or 90 degrees). Then using this layer as a mask to my base image. Tinted in the colors white, black, blue, red, gold or green.

The Splashes -  A function that makes random ellipses around the canvas in a separate layer, attached in the back and front pillar. And, again, using this layer as a mask to my base image. Tinted in the same color the pillar received.

The Interferences - Probably the one that gave me more trouble to adapt. This funcion is a flow field that uses the color and brightness of my base image to draw and color itself. First I plot particles to use as initial position of the flow and make them draw based on the difference in brightness of my base image. The flow is coloured getting the pixel position of that base image. Tinted in the colors white, gold or black.

To support those code functions and to make sure that the outputs will have many variations, I've prompted and composited 40 base images that are used as background, patterns, textures, flow drawing/colouring and frames.

There are concrete textures, painting flow textures and golden foil textures for background and pillars; Rough contrasted painting flows (white and gold) for the interferences; Labyrinth, Rectangular and Copacabana patterns; 6 paper frames variations to finalize the composition.

Press "G" to save currebt .png canvas.

Read more about: https://brunomerli.com/reveries-automata
